pkgmetadata.longdescription: FluidSynth takes precedence over WildMIDI at runtime. If no external MIDI synthesizer backend is enabled, EasyRPG Player falls back to ALSA for native MIDI support. At version 0.8, this will most likely result in no sound.

use.flag: Support FluidSynth as a MIDI synthesizer backend. Support the `--soundfont` command line option for custom soundfonts
Use media-libs/harfbuzz for Unicode text shaping. Depends on external font support by means of the truetype USE flag
Support WildMIDI as a MIDI synthesizer backend
